message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO 

This paper focuses on continual learning in dynamic systems, which involves learning from data streams and adapting to new tasks while preserving previous knowledge. This topic is closely related to machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural networks (cs.NE), and robotics (cs.RO). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper. Among them, cs.LG and cs.CV are the most relevant ones as the paper deals with model training and evaluation on image datasets.
